tagline: jQuery plug in to show a Twitter like notification effect
body:
### jQuery plugin for notifications
This jQuery plugin will help you display custom notifications that get attention, but can be less intrusive.

### Author
This plugin was written in 2009 by Andrew Alba (@andrewalba) of http://AlbaWebStudio.com.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the plugin? Check out the support page we have setup http://andrewalba.github.com/jquery.showmessage/issues.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: jQuery.showMessage
